1. **Self-Assessment**
   **On a scale of 1 (novice) to 5 (expert), how would you rate your current proficiency with data analytics tools (e.g., Excel, Power BI, Python)?**
     • 1  2  3  4  5
   **Follow-up (open):** Which tool or technique do you use most often, and in what context?

2. **Learning Priorities**
   **Which of the following topics are your top three priorities for this one-day data class?** *(Select up to three)*

   * Data cleaning & quality
   * Data modeling & governance
   * Predictive analytics (regression & classification)
   * Time-series forecasting
   * Dashboarding & visualization
   * No-code/low-code AI tools
   * Ethics, bias & governance
   * Other (please specify)
     **Follow-up (open):** For each selected topic, briefly explain why it matters to your team or projects.

3. **Current Challenges**
   **Which of these data challenges best describe your biggest pain points?** *(Select up to two)*

   * Fragmented data sources
   * Manual, time-consuming reporting
   * Lack of data governance & ownership
   * Limited analytical skillsets
   * Difficulty extracting actionable insights
   * Other (please specify)
     **Follow-up (open):** How does each chosen challenge impact your daily decision-making or operations?

4. **Skill Gaps & Desired Outcomes**
   **Which single gap would you most like to close through this training?** *(Select one)*

   * Hands-on data preparation techniques
   * Building & validating predictive models
   * Designing interactive dashboards
   * Integrating AI/GenAI into workflows
   * Establishing FAIR data practices
   * Other (please specify)
     **Follow-up (open):** What specific capability or outcome would make you consider this class a success?
